content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, angle <math alttext="beta"><semantics><mi>β</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is an angle in standard position with its terminal ray in Quadrant I. If <math alttext="sin beta equals 0.8"><semantics><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="cos beta equals 0.6"><semantics><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, what is the value of <math alttext="cos open parentheses 2 beta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>β</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 2 open parentheses 0.8 close parentheses open parentheses 0.6 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mn>0.8</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>0.6</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="2 open parentheses 0.8 close parentheses open parentheses 0.6 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mfenced><mn>0.8</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mn>0.6</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 0.6 close parentheses squared minus open parentheses 0.8 close parentheses squared"><semantics><mrow><msup><mfenced><mn>0.6</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><msup><mfenced><mn>0.8</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 0.8 close parentheses squared plus open parentheses 0.6 close parentheses squared"><semantics><mrow><msup><mfenced><mn>0.8</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mfenced><mn>0.6</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses 0.6 close parentheses squared minus open parentheses 0.8 close parentheses squared"><semantics><mrow><msup><mfenced><mn>0.6</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><msup><mfenced><mn>0.8</mn></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Apply numerical results in a given mathematical or applied context.
